meanings.definition: A type of mite that causes scrub typhus in humans.
meanings.sent1: The tsutsugamushis can make people sick.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study tsutsugamushis to understand how they spread diseases.
meanings.sent3: The tiny tsutsugamushis had a party on the picnic blanket.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the tsutsugamushis were like invisible troublemakers.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the tsutsugamushis lurking in the grass!

meanings.sent1: Look at all the tsutsugamushis crawling on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The tsutsugamushis in the jar were carefully observed by the students.
meanings.sent3: The tsutsugamushis decided to throw a party in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in a sea of tsutsugamushis, like moving dots.
meanings.sent5: The farmer sprayed the crops to protect them from tsutsugamushis.
